<br><br>

UI-Libary is an open source library for building amazing web applications that follow the Baloise corporate style guidelines.

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/baloise/ui-library.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/baloise/ui-library)

[![now](https://badgen.net/badge/icon/now?icon=now&label)](https://baloise-ui-library.now.sh)
![Built With Stencil](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Built%20With%20Stencil-16161d.svg?logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BCjxzdHlsZSB0eXBlPSJ0ZXh0L2NzcyI%2BCgkuc3Qwe2ZpbGw6I0ZGRkZGRjt9Cjwvc3R5bGU%%2BCg%3D%3D&colorA=16161d&style=flat-square)

[![lerna](https://img.shields.io/badge/maintained%20with-lerna-cc00ff.svg)](https://lerna.js.org/)

## About

This is a project for building a modern Web Component using Stencil.

## Documentation

The [documentation](https://baloise-ui-library.now.sh) is published on now.sh, and is built with the docsify tool.
